summary: The Skyrim Soundtrack Expansion adds nearly 30 minutes of original orchestral music by Robert Scott to the game.
descriptionHtml:
What It Does:

The Skyrim Soundtrack Expansion adds nearly 30 minutes of original orchestral music by Robert Scott to the game. Currently, only the world exploration playlists are expanded, but there may be new tracks in the future to expand dungeon and town playlists.


Who It\'s For:

Anyone who wants additional music that fits within the existing soundtrack to enhance the Skyrim experience.

This is not a soundtrack replacement. None of the default tracks are removed by this mod, and the new tracks are composed and orchestrated to continue the existing mood and feel of the game, not to alter it or re-imagine it. 

Hear the soundtrack at:  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kSajPn_ZdLo&list=PLDN9U5SYkhkA_FBqzLzz3u2uoxX0e6gFw&feature=mh_lolz


Technical Details:

This mod may not be compatible with other mods that modify Skyrim\'s music system. 

This mod is compatible with Dawnguard, and Hearthfire.

Music and sound in Skyrim may occasionally skip, but this is not an issue caused or resolved by this mod.

Requires 40 MB hard disk space for new music.


Disclaimer:

This soundtrack is entirely legal to download, and is published by the copyright owner (Robert Scott) specifically for use in Skyrim.

The soundtrack is intended for use only in Skyrim and may not be used in any other way without prior written permission.


www.rscomposer.com
author: Robert Scott
